pages.text: A cracked gem can occur in the heat of battle, such as a gem taking too much extra damage upon poofing.$(br2)A Warden hitting a gem, for example, is devastating and nearly always cracks or shatters a gemstone. Be careful.
To fix a cracked gem, toss her gemstone into a pool of Pink Gem Essence. The crack will be healed. Alternate methods may be introduced later.
